alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:38PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Palm Beach County through 630 PM EDT... At 537 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud 10 miles east of Belle Glade Camp, or 10 miles southeast of Belle Glade, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Belle Glade, Canal Point, Royal Palm Beach, Loxahatchee NWR, Belle Glade Camp, North County Airport, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, The Acreage, Philo Farms, Caloosa and Jupiter Farms. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
